SELECT MAI_AniCode, MAC_Name, MAI_BName, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('200','202',MAI_Sex) as MAI_GENDER, MTI_TEAMNAME, MVI_VVRMNAME, TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'yyyy-mm-dd') as MAI_Birthday, TO_CHAR(DATE1,'YYYY-MM-DD') as DATE1, TO_CHAR(DATE2,'YYYY-MM-DD') as DATE2, (SELECT fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('200','252',DAIO_RESN) FROM DT_ANI_IO WHERE C.DAIO_ANICODE = DAIO_ANICODE AND TO_CHAR(DATE2,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(DAIO_IODATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND DAIO_IOTYPE = '2') AS TYPE2, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('200','200',MAI_RegType) as MAI_RegType, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('200','201',MAI_CurSts) as MAI_CurSts, A.CMN_DEL_STS from MF_ANI_INFO A left join (SELECT DAIO_ANICODE, MAX(DAIO_IODATE) AS DATE2 FROM DT_ANI_IO WHERE DAIO_IOTYPE = '2' GROUP BY DAIO_ANICODE) C on (C.DAIO_ANICODE = MAI_ANICODE), (SELECT DAIO_ANICODE, MAX(DAIO_IODATE) AS DATE1 FROM DT_ANI_IO WHERE DAIO_IOTYPE = '1' GROUP BY DAIO_ANICODE) B, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_VVRM_INFO, MF_TEAM_INFO WHERE MAC_ANICLSCODE = MAI_ANICLSCODE AND B.DAIO_ANICODE = MAI_ANICODE AND MVI_VVRMNO = MAI_VVRMNO AND MTI_TEAMNO = MAI_TEAMNO
AND MAI_DethType != '0'
AND MAI_DethType = '1'
AND MAI_DethType = '2'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME !=' '
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '박제실'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = ='사료실'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = ='곤충관'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '동물교실'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '나비온실'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '돌고래쇼장'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '해양관'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '홍학사'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '동물한마당'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '꼬마동물사'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '동물농장'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '열대조류관'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '큰물새장'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '황새마을'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '맹금사'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '공작마을'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '사슴사'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '제1AF관'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '제2AF관'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '제3AF관'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '유인원관'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '호주관'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '야행관'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '대동물관'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '동양관'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '낙타사'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '여우사'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '맹수사'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '우리숲우리동물관'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '곰사'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '남미관'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '종보전교육관'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '들소사'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '번식장'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '동물병원'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME = '가금사'
AND TO_CHAR(MAI_BIRTHDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{cal_1}
AND TO_CHAR(MAI_BIRTHDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{cal_2}
AND TO_CHAR(DAIO_IODATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{cal_3}
AND TO_CHAR(DAIO_IODATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{cal_4}
AND TO_CHAR(MAI_DethDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{cal_5}
AND TO_CHAR(MAI_DethDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{cal_6}
AND MAI_AniCode like '%' || #{codeSearch} || '%'
AND MAC_Name like '%' || #{schKeyword} || '%'
AND A.CMN_DEL_STS = #{del_sts}
AND MAI_KnjpType =2
AND MAI_KnjpType = 1
ORDER BY MAC_AniCode1, MAC_AniCode2, MAC_AniCode3, MAC_AniCode4_Seq, MAI_AniCode_Seq
ORDER BY MAC_Name ASC
ORDER BY MAI_BIRTHDAY DESC
ORDER BY DAIO_IODate DESC
ORDER BY MAI_DethDate DESC

SELECT FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAC_ANICLSCODE || '-' || MAC_ANICODE4_SEQ, '1') || '(' || MAC_ANICODE1 || ')' AS CLS1_NAME, FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAC_ANICLSCODE || '-' || MAC_ANICODE4_SEQ, '2') || '(' || MAC_ANICODE2 || ')' AS CLS2_NAME, FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAC_ANICLSCODE || '-' || MAC_ANICODE4_SEQ, '3') || '(' || MAC_ANICODE3 || ')' AS CLS3_NAME, A.* FROM ( SELECT MAC_ANICLSCODE, MAC_ANICODE1, MAC_ANICODE2, MAC_ANICODE3, MAC_ANICODE4_SEQ, MAC_NAME, MAC_ENAME, MAC_SNAME, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','206',MAC_CITES) AS MAC_CITES, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','207',MAC_ENDANG) AS MAC_ENDANG , MAC_NATMON, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','205',MAC_RANK) AS MAC_RANK, MAC_ORGPLACE, MAC_BRDPERID, MAC_GESTPERID, CMN_DEL_STS FROM MF_ANI_CLS WHERE MAC_ANICLSCODE = #{mac_aniclscode} ) A
